Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth

Dive deeply into creatures of legends!
Release the beasts! Heroes abound in the Age of Lost Omens, but for every great hero, there is an even greater monster. 

Lost Omens Monsters of Myth  provides details on 20 of the most infamous and terrifying monsters from the Inner Sea region and beyond. Uncover the secrets of some of Golarion's greatest monsters from the Sandpoint Devil to Fafnheir, the Father of All Linnorms, and more. Monsters of Myth provides rumors, tales, and even treasures for the brave adventurers willing to face these legendary creatures!
  • Gorgeous full-color illustrations on for all these terrifying creatures!
  • New feats, archetypes, and options for player characters centered around the rich history of these myths on Golarion.
  • Universal monster rules to simplify special attacks, defenses, and qualities like grab, swallow whole, and regeneration.
  • Valuable information for Gamemasters on how to integrate the stories, creatures, and lore into a campaign at any level.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • Individual area descriptions linked to maps, containing new encounters, treasure parcels and descriptions for just that area
  • Tokens for each encounter are all pre-placed in starting locations on the map. You can edit these on the fly.
  • Drag and drop treasure parcels and Encounter XP that is easily awarded to your players to keep the game moving ahead
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Martin Blake, and Bret Davenport
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder 2.0 ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
